'''Baron Darthen Ironwright'''<ref>Full name given in the glossary at the end of ''[[Forsaken House]]'' was a former member of the [[Company of the White Star]]. He retired to become lord of his own small hold near [[Scornubel]]. He was married and has a number of children.
